name: Bare-Handed
description: A regular punch, what else to say?

name: Kitchen Knife
description: One of the basic tools used during a cooking.

name: Medieval Sword
description: This seems to be stolen from a museum?

name: Mosin-Nagant Rifle
description: This rifle was greatly used during the Great War.

name: Outlaw Sabre
description: A weapon that is known by its filthy wielders.

name: Frying Pan
description: Be careful when it is heated!

name: Cleaver
description: I do not think you are a butcher to use that.

name: Grim Reaper Scythe
description: Where did you even get that?

name: Ballistic Shield
description: I do not get it? Are you attacking or defending yourself?

name: Dagger
description: Has an advantage of quick slashes

name: Morning Star
description: You do not wanna be woken up by that.

name: Rocket Launcher
description: KABOOM! There goes your tower, watch it crumble!
